DOC.brief_summary: This observational study evaluate Xeloda ( capecitabine ) monotherapy effect disease-free survival patient colon cancer stage III ( Duke C ) surgical resection . Data collect 3 year .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Xeloda ( Capecitabine ) Monotherapy Patients With Colorectal Cancer ( AXEL )
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , age 18 year Presence colon adenocarcinoma Surgical resection colon cancer stage III ( Duke C ) Prior adjuvant therapy Xeloda monotherapy Contraindications Xeloda
